title: Void Fizz Particles are Missing
body: In game, when I use my Q there are absolutely no particles that show up. When I use my W, a few particles are missing that come out of my weapon. I don't know if something is missing from my E and R because I didn't notice anything strange occur, but there could be a couple particles missing that I just can't see very well. Please help. I want to enjoy the skin I purchased.

replies.body:
Hey Jooostin,

Thanks for the report! We'll look into the missing particles!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=gEzcU7I4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-05T22:51:47.644+0000)
>
> Hey Jooostin,
> 
> Thanks for the report! We'll look into the missing particles!

Can you request one of your fellow Rioters to post something on the STUPID DISCONNECTING PROBLEMS WE'RE EXPERIENCING!  FOR THE LOVE OF GOD!  PLEASE?!  Thank you.
